Description: Red-brown pottery ostracon, from the body of a large convex vessel, both interior and exterior grooved, with remains of twelve lines of black-painted demotic text on the exterior in three paragraphs, unidentified black deposit on interior.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (389751) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/389751)
Acquisition name: Purchased through: R J Moss & Co
